text: right | thumb | 200x200px | a Macedonian phalanx The armed forces are the backbone of defending the security of their countries on land, sea, and air. They are organised, armed, and trained to achieve the goals set by the state that they fight for. == Divisions == Many countries in the present day separate their armed forces that fight on land, at sea, in the air, and policing the border. These groups are usually called: * Army * Navy * Air force * Paramilitary == Related pages == * Military == References == Category:Military terminology Category:Military forces
title: Armed forces
